import React from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import DropdownButton from "react-bootstrap/DropdownButton"; import Dropdown from "react-bootstrap/Dropdown"; import { constant } from "./constant"; class Post extends React.Component { render() { const post = this.props.post; const author = this.props.author; return (
{author.name}

{post.description}

{post.imgUrl && }

); } } export default Post;
